TXT.title: Yeonjun (Choi Yeon-jun)
TXT.description: Yeonjun (연준) is a South Korean singer and rapper under Big Hit Entertainment. He is the main rapper, main dancer and vocalist of the boy group TXT.

TXT.title: Soobin (Choi Soo-bin)
TXT.description: Soobin (수빈) is a South Korean singer under Big Hit Entertainment. He is the leader, lead rapper, lead dancer and vocalist of the boy group TXT.

TXT.title: Beomgyu (Choi Beom-gyu)
TXT.description: Beomgyu (범규) is a South Korean singer under Big Hit Entertainment. He is the lead vocalist of the boy group TXT.

TXT.title: Taehyun (Kang Tae-hyun)
TXT.description: Taehyun (태현) is a South Korean singer under Big Hit Entertainment. He is the main vocalist of the boy group TXT.

TXT.title: Hueningkai (Kai Kamal Huening, Chung Kai)
TXT.description: Hueningkai (휴닝카이) is a Korean-American singer under Big Hit Entertainment. He is the lead vocalist, center, visual and maknae of the boy group TXT.
